document.full_text: congress pledged to usher in a new way of doing business when it banned earmarks, but lawmakers still have a way to get their projects funded: appealing directly to federal agencies for money.
document.title: lawmakers find a path around an earmarks ban
lines_and_colors: congress pledged to usher in a new way of doing business when it banned earmarks, but lawmakers still have a way to get their projects funded: appealing directly to federal agencies for money.
